description: a(0) = 1; a(n+1) = a(n) - n if a(n) > n, otherwise a(n+1) = a(n) + a(a(n)).
comments: a(A193854(n)) = 1, n>0;A123643 and A123644 give record values and their positions: A123643(n)=a(A123644(n)). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 04 2006
links: R. Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
prog: (Haskell)a062039 n = a062039_list !! na062039_list = 1 : f 1 0 where   f x n | x > n     = (x-n) : f (x-n) (n+1)         | otherwise =    x' : f x' (n+1) where x' = x + a062039 x-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 10 2011
crossrefs: A123643 and A123644 give record values and their positions: A123643(n)=a(A123644(n)).
author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 12 2001
